urls.title: 'He's scaring our own voters': Republicans run into a Donald Trump problem as they push mail voting
urls.description: As Donald Trump rails on mail-voting, Republicans have had to work around the president's harsh rhetoric to push the option.

entity.name: Trump says he discussed Venezuela and the Mueller report with Putin in an hour-long call
entity.description: President Trump confirmed the call in a series of Tweets on Friday, adding that the political turmoil in Venezuela was also a subject of a phone conversation with Russia's Vladimir Putin. Referring to the report's conclusion that Russia interfered in the 2016 election while clearing the Trump campaign of conspiracy, Trump said he and Putin discussed the "Russia Hoax."

text:
@realDonaldTrump REAL Republicans support #MailInVoting (just like #Trump votes!) because it is good for our Country's Democracy, particularly during the #CoronaVirus DISASTER!

Why is @TeamTrump putting @GOP lives in danger? Why does Putin support @Trump?

#MAGA2020!
